mods.abstract: Alvin C. York, his wife Gracie, York familiy members, Gov. Prentice Cooper, and spectators look on as a sign designating 6th Avenue as "Sergeant York Avenue" is unveiled. The scene takes place in front of the Knickerbocker Theatre during the premiere of the movie "Sergeant York."

titleInfo.title: Dr. Walter H. Storer Photograph Collection, ca. 1930-1955

relatedItem.abstract: Alvin Cullum York (1887-1964) was one of the most decorated soldiers of the First World War. A recipient of the Medal of Honor and the French Legion of Honour, York is considered one of the greatest of Tennesseeâ€™s native sons...
